content:
Of course! Here are some events in Fremantle that are perfect for younger children:

1. Little Creatures Daytime Disco: An afternoon dance party with a live DJ and family-friendly snacks, held on the last Sunday of every month.

2. The Round House Tunnel Tour: A short guided tour of the tunnels located beneath the historic Round House, suitable for younger children.

3. Fremantle Toy Library: A library dedicated solely to toys where parents can borrow toys for their children at an affordable cost.

4. Fremantle Leisure Centre: Offers a range of water-based activities like swimming and diving lessons for kids, and indoor sports areas for family fun.

5. Esplanade Reserve Playground: A large playground with plenty of equipment tailored to younger children like a swing set, giant slides, and monkey bars.

6. Fremantle Story Time Sessions: An interactive session where children can listen to stories and participate in songs and games, which is held at Fremantle Library every week.

7. Fremantle Arts Centre Kids' Studio Workshop: A series of creative workshops designed especially for children to learn the art and craft basics, held on weekends.

These events and places are suitable for toddlers and younger children and can provide fun and educational experiences for your little ones.
